I don't think I saw this in the list of what not to suggest. It would be very nice to adjust the gravity to test how well certain designs would work on other bodies.

It'd either be a drop down list that lets you select a certain body, or you can punch in any number between .049 m/s (gilly) and 16.7 m/s (Eve)

It is not in the what not to suggest list, but it has been already suggested a few weeks ago.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/47920-Hack-Gravity-Selectable-Value?highlight=hack+gravity

Hmmmmmm....gravity...

Yup, would be nice for derping around. Wasn't there a mod that would do this?
